================

### Government of Canada Tender Announcement

**Yellowknife Grounds Maintenance Services**

This tende request announcement concerns the provision of grounds maintenance services in the Yellowknife area. The scope of work includes, but is not limited to, the supply of labor, materials, and equipment for:

* Year-round maintenance of sidewalks, stairs, and pedestrian walkways at Federally owned buildings and properties
* Snow removal and application of ice inhibitors
* Maintenance of Crown-owned buildings and properties in Yellowknife

**Contract Details**

* Reference Number: PW-STN-207-5596
* Solicitation Number: EW076-230653/A
* Amendment Number: 1
* Tender Closing Date: January 31, 2023, at 15:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: April 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024 (with two additional 1-year option periods)

**Contract Location**

The work will be located in Yellowknife, Northwest Territories, and includes the following sites:

* Crown-owned buildings: Rat Lake, Sissons Court, Lanky Court, Forrest Park, Aspen Apartments, PSPC Tradeshop, and 140 Crown single/detached housing units
* Delivery sites: EXCON, CFB Suffield, Ralston, Alberta, and Trail’s End Camp, Cochrane, Alberta

**Submission Requirements**

Due to COVID-19 pandemic-related restrictions, suppliers are encouraged to submit bids electronically using the Canada Post epost Connect application. Faxed bids will be accepted.

**Important Notes**

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Suppliers are advised to consult Buysandsell.gc.ca for up-to-date information on procurement status.

**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact Melanie Perrin at (306) 491-5871 or melanie.perrin@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca.
